price: ያላዩትን ነገር አየሁ፡፡ ከመልክተኛው (ከፈረሱ ኮቴ) ዱካም ጭብጥ አፈርን ዘገንኩ፡፡ (በቅርጹ ላይ) ጣልኳትም፡፡ እንደዚሁም ነፍሴ ሸለመችልኝ» አለ፡፡
arabic: قَالَ بَصُرۡتُ بِمَا لَمۡ يَبۡصُرُواْ بِهِۦ فَقَبَضۡتُ قَبۡضَةٗ مِّنۡ أَثَرِ ٱلرَّسُولِ فَنَبَذۡتُهَا وَكَذَٰلِكَ سَوَّلَتۡ لِي نَفۡسِي

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla baṣur'tu bimā lam yabṣurū bihi faqabaḍtu qabḍatan min athari al-rasūli fanabadhtuhā wakadhālika sawwalat lī nafsī
